title: Smashed Chickpea and Avocado Sandwich
directions: Smash/mash the chickpeas and avocado with a potato masher or a fork, mix in the onion, lime juice and salt to taste
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
2 tablespoons green or red onion, finely sliced or diced
8 slices bread (optionally lightly toasted)(gluten-free for gluten-free)
1 cup baby spinach or arugula or other greens
